mapper.select: SELECT rcv_dt, appr_dttm, rep_appr_no, appr_no, sale_dttm, mbr_id, card_dtl_grp_cd, dtl_cd_nm, card_no, stlmt_alcmpn_cd, alcmpn_nm, stlmt_mcnt_cd, mcnt_nm, alcmpn_cd, alcmpn_nm2, mcnt_cd, mcnt_nm2, pnt_knd_cd, dtl_cd_nm2, slip_cd, dtl_cd_nm3, sale_amt, pnt, cs_mbr_cmmsn, cmmsn, pmnt_way_cd, dtl_cd_nm4, org_cd, dtl_cd_nm5, oil_prdct_sgrp_cd, dtl_cd_nm6, cpn_prd_cd, prd_nm, oriappr_dt, oriappr_no, cnsl_slip_tp_cd, cnsl_slip_tp_nm from MOCK_QC_TEST where mbr_id = #{memberId}
